function.name: getcell
function.description: Retrieves the contents of cell column, row from Excel spreadsheet sheet. column and row can either be an index number (1,5) , or a readable indicator (A, 5). row can be omitted by putting the full cell indicator in the second parameter (A5). Note that column and row in numeric form are 1-based (counting starts at 1) to make them compatible with string-based lookups. When evaluate is set to false, formulas in the sheet will not be evaluated but return null instead.

example.description: Logging all column values in a spreadsheet:
